name: Calendar
description: Calendar is an input component to select a date.

selection-mode.label: selectionMode
selection-mode.title: Defines the quantity of the selection, valid values are "single", "multiple" and "range".

date-format.label: dateFormat
date-format.title: Format of the date. Defaults to PrimeVue Locale configuration.

inline.label: inline
inline.title: When enabled, displays the calendar as inline instead of an overlay.

show-other-months.label: showOtherMonths
show-other-months.title: Whether to display dates in other months (non-selectable) at the start or end of the current month. To make these days selectable use the selectOtherMonths option.

select-other-months.label: selectOtherMonths
select-other-months.title: Whether days in other months shown before or after the current month are selectable. This only applies if the showOtherMonths option is set to true.

show-icon.label: showIcon
show-icon.title: When enabled, displays a button with icon next to input.

previous-icon.label: previousIcon
previous-icon.title: Icon to show in the previous button.

next-icon.label: nextIcon
next-icon.title: Icon to show in the next button.

increment-icon.label: incrementIcon
increment-icon.title: Icon to show in each of the increment buttons.

decrement-icon.label: decrementIcon
decrement-icon.title: Icon to show in each of the decrement buttons.

view.label: view
view.title: Type of view to display, valid valids are "date" for datepicker and "month" for month picker.

touch-u-i.label: touchUI
touch-u-i.title: When enabled, calendar overlay is displayed as optimized for touch devices.

month-navigator.label: monthNavigator
month-navigator.title: Whether the month should be rendered as a dropdown instead of text.

year-navigator.label: yearNavigator
year-navigator.title: Whether the year should be rendered as a dropdown instead of text.

year-range.label: yearRange
year-range.title: The range of years displayed in the year drop-down in (nnnn:nnnn) format such as (2000:2020).

panel-class.label: panelClass
panel-class.title: Style class of the overlay panel.

max-date-count.label: maxDateCount
max-date-count.title: Maximum number of selectable dates in multiple mode.

show-on-focus.label: showOnFocus
show-on-focus.title: When disabled, datepicker will not be visible with input focus.

base-z-index.label: baseZIndex
base-z-index.title: Base zIndex value to use in layering.

show-button-bar.label: showButtonBar
show-button-bar.title: Whether to display today and clear buttons at the footer

short-year-cutoff.label: shortYearCutoff
short-year-cutoff.title: The cutoff year for determining the century for a date.

show-seconds.label: showSeconds
show-seconds.title: Whether to show the seconds in time picker.

hide-on-date-time-select.label: hideOnDateTimeSelect
hide-on-date-time-select.title: Whether to hide the overlay on date selection when showTime is enabled.

hide-on-range-selection.label: hideOnRangeSelection
hide-on-range-selection.title: Whether to hide the overlay on date selection is completed when selectionMode is range.

show-week.label: showWeek
show-week.title: When enabled, calendar will show week numbers.

manual-input.label: manualInput
manual-input.title: Whether to allow entering the date manually via typing.

append-to.label: appendTo
append-to.title: A valid query selector or an HTMLElement to specify where the overlay gets attached. Special keywords are "body" for document body and "self" for the element itself.

disabled.label: disabled
disabled.title: When present, it specifies that the element should be disabled.

invalid.label: invalid
invalid.title: When present, it specifies that the component should have invalid state style.

variant.label: variant
variant.title: Specifies the input variant of the component.

readonly.label: readonly
readonly.title: When present, it specifies that an input field is read-only.

input-id.label: inputId
input-id.title: Identifier of the underlying input element.

input-class.label: inputClass
input-class.title: Style class of the input field.

input-style.label: inputStyle
input-style.title: Inline style of the input field.

input-props.label: inputProps
input-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLInputElement to the focusable input element inside the component.

panel-style.label: panelStyle
panel-style.title: Inline style of the overlay panel.

panel-props.label: panelProps
panel-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLDivElement to the overlay panel inside the component.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

slots.name: header
slots.title: Custom content for the component header.

slots.name: footer
slots.title: Custom content for the component footer.

slots.name: date
slots.title: Custom content for the calendar cell.

slots.name: decade
slots.title: Custom content for the calendar decade.

events.name: input
events.title: Callback to invoke when input field is being typed.

events.name: date-select
events.title: Callback to invoke when a date is selected.

events.name: show
events.title: Callback to invoke when datepicker panel is shown.

events.name: hide
events.title: Callback to invoke when datepicker panel is hidden.

events.name: today-click
events.title: Callback to invoke when today button is clicked.

events.name: clear-click
events.title: Callback to invoke when clear button is clicked.

events.name: month-change
events.title: Callback to invoke when a month is changed using the navigators.

events.name: year-change
events.title: Callback to invoke when a year is changed using the navigators.

events.name: focus
events.title: Callback to invoke on focus of input field.

events.name: blur
events.title: Callback to invoke on blur of input field.

events.name: keydown
events.title: Callback to invoke when a key is pressed.
